verses.verse: Now this is the <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, that ye might do them in the <S%H776>land<s%> whither ye <S%H5674>go<s%> over to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>;

that thou mightest <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H1121>thee<s%>, thou, and thy son, and thy <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%>; and that thy <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged<s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H3478>therefore<s%>, O Israel, and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3190>it<s%>; that it may be well with <S%H7235>thee<s%>, and that ye may increase <S%H3966>mightily<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> unto <S%H776>thee<s%>, in a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:
and thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with all thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and with all thy <S%H3966>might<s%>.
And these <S%H1697>words<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, shall be upon thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>;

and thou shalt teach them <S%H8150>diligently<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, and shalt <S%H1696>talk<s%> of them when thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, and when thou <S%H3212>walkest<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and when thou liest <S%H7901>down<s%>, and when thou risest <S%H6965>up<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> upon thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall be for <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> between thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> them upon the <S%H4201>door-posts<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, and upon thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

And it shall <S%H3068>be<s%>, when Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H1419>thee<s%>, great and <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, which thou buildest <S%H1129>not<s%>,

and <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of all <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H4390>things<s%>, which thou filledst <S%H953>not<s%>, and cisterns <S%H2672>hewn<s%> <S%H2672>out<s%>, which thou hewedst <S%H3754>not<s%>, vineyards and <S%H2132>olive-trees<s%>, which thou <S%H5193>plantedst<s%> <S%H398>not<s%>, and thou shalt eat and be <S%H7646>full<s%>;

then <S%H8104>beware<s%> lest thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>; and him shalt thou <S%H5647>serve<s%>, and shalt <S%H7650>swear<s%> by his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that are round about <S%H5439>you<s%>;

for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>; lest the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H8045>thee<s%>, and he destroy thee from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H5254>tempt<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, as ye <S%H5254>tempted<s%> him in <S%H4532>Massah<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H8104>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, which he hath commanded <S%H6680>thee<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H935>thee<s%>, and that thou mayest go in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>,
to thrust <S%H1920>out<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>thee<s%>, as Jehovah hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

When thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asketh<s%> thee in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What mean the <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> hath commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>?

then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, We were <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7451>sore<s%>, upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and upon all his <S%H1004>house<s%>, before our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>;
and he brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H935>thence<s%>, that he might bring us in, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, for our <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%>, that he might preserve us <S%H2421>alive<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And it shall be <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto <S%H8104>us<s%>, if we observe to <S%H6213>do<s%> all <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, as he hath commanded <S%H6680>us<s%>.
